website_summaries.verdict: This model boasts a truly unique look, and Braven's TrueWireless technology allows pairing with a second Braven speaker for true stereo sound.
pros: For users who value the aesthetics of their speaker, the pearl color and exterior design is notably attractive
The 12 hour run time of a fully-charged battery is adequate for most users
Includes the weatherproof features for which Braven is known
The sound quality is good, and is really enhanced when paired with a second speaker using Braven's TrueWireless technology
The 1,400 mAh USB power bank can be used to charge external devices such as smartphones or MP3 players
cons: The aux input and USB power bank can only be accessed by removing part of the protective exterior cover

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: ... was a christmas present for my tweenagers and they love it. The sound is good
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas present for my tweenagers and they love it. The sound is good, it is easy to pare with devices, it is small and very portable and to top it off VERY stylish! I like that you don't need an APP to play this device (like some others), it is simply and easy.

customer_reviews.title: Pro's -- Sound quality ok;  Cons -- battery life terrible
customer_reviews.text: Had this wireless speaker for a while now -- on the plus side, the sound is fine. However the battery life is lousy. It is almost to the point where if it isn't plugged in, it doesn't work. Not what I expected.
